overview: Passarinho (Rafael Brand√£o) is a homeless teenager who lives invisible to society, facing all the adversities of life on the street, lack of food, money and feeling of loneliness. But from the contacts he has with the theater, he will try to change his reality by making his art, in his own way. He will face oppression against art and will endure another day of survival in this difficult journey.
title: Passarinho
